column3:
ゲルド砂漠を進み モルダバ山の麓にある
怪しげな遺跡に近づくと
何者かの声が聞こえてきた

この迷宮を踏破すれば
祝福が与えられるらしい
column4:
As you advanced through the Gerudo Desert
and arrived in front of the suspicious ruins
resting at the foot of Daval Peak, you heard
a voice.

It seems that, if you're able tomake it through
this labyrinth, you will receive a blessing.

column3:
モルダバ山の麓に作られた砂漠の迷宮

それを抜けた先には
古代の祠が待ち構えていた
column4:
A labyrinth built at the foot of Daval Peak...

There was a shrine waiting for you
at the end of the labyrinth.
